name: Chirp
0:
”Alexa, ask Chirp to continue my last book.”
”Alexa, tell Chirp to play Treasure Island.”
”Alexa, stream Orphan Train Escape using Chirp.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chirp
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use Chirp skill for Amazon Alexa to listen to your Chirp audiobooks with Amazon Alexa. 

To get started, enable the Chirp skill on Amazon Alexa. Once enabled, follow the steps to link your Chirp account. Simply say “Alexa, tell Chirp to play my last book” and we’ll start playing your most recently-played book from where you left off!
